thread.title: Stephen Colbert Has An Ingenious Plan To Keep Donald Trump Off Twitter
thread.title_full: Stephen Colbert Has An Ingenious Plan To Keep Donald Trump Off Twitter

author: Ed Mazza
title: Stephen Colbert Has An Ingenious Plan To Keep Donald Trump Off Twitter
text:
Stephen Colbert Has An Ingenious Plan To Keep Donald Trump Off Twitter But will it work? 
Stephen Colbert is here to help. 
The CBS “ Late Show ” host cited a Politico report that found President Donald Trump’s staff during the presidential campaign noticed he would tweet whenever he saw criticism of himself. 
So to keep him off Twitter, his staff would make sure that he watched news that featured “ a steady stream of praise .” 
“And, as I’ve said, we do know he likes a steady stream ,” Colbert cracked. 
So to help keep Trump off Twitter now, Colbert created a special newscast the White House staff can show him anytime he needs that steady stream. 
Check it out above.
